statements: SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractionLog;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractionLog;
SELECT interaction_id, communication_log FROM PlayerInteractionLog;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PlayerInteractionLog;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, communication_log FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE interaction_type = 'login' AND player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractionLog WHERE player_id = 4 AND interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM PlayerInteractionLog GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_description FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, log_type, log_content FROM communication_logs WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, player_id, log_timestamp, log_type, log_content FROM communication_logs WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT log_id, player_id, log_timestamp, log_type FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('like', 'comment')
SELECT * FROM player_interactions ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE player_id = 5 AND log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, conduct_type, conduct_date FROM conduct_monitoring WHERE conduct_type = 'Warning' ORDER BY conduct_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, DATE_FORMAT(interaction_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM player_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs cl JOIN player_interactions pi ON cl.player_id = pi.player_id WHERE cl.log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY cl.log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_info;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_info ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interaction_logs WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_name, communication_type, message FROM player_info JOIN communication_logs ON player_info.player_id = communication_logs.player_id;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, description FROM behavior_logs WHERE TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_info;
SELECT * FROM interaction_logs WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, communication_type, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'email';
SELECT player_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM interaction_logs GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM behavior_logs GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM players
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_logs ORDER BY send_time ASC
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;

SELECT player_name, game_sessions.start_time, game_sessions.end_time, game_actions.action_type FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id JOIN game_actions ON game_sessions.session_id = game_actions.session_id WHERE players.player_id = 1 ORDER BY game_sessions.start_time DESC;

SELECT players.player_name, COUNT(game_sessions.session_id) AS session_count FROM players LEFT JOIN game_sessions ON players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id GROUP BY players.player_id HAVING session_count > 10 ORDER BY session_count DESC;

SELECT chat_logs.sender_id, chat_logs.receiver_id, chat_logs.message_text, players.player_name FROM chat_logs JOIN players ON chat_logs.sender_id = players.player_id WHERE send_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY send_time ASC LIMIT 10;
